```sql key_insights
SELECT

FROM analysis_insights

```

## Key Findings

{{findings_narrative}}

### Finding 1: {{primary_finding_title}}

```sql finding_1_data
SELECT 
  metric_name,
  metric_value,
  unit,
  category,
  description
FROM key_metrics
WHERE category = '{{primary_finding_category}}'
ORDER BY metric_value DESC
```

**Statistical Evidence:**
<DataTable data={finding_1_data} />

**Business Impact:** {{finding_1_impact}}  
**Confidence Level:** {{finding_1_confidence}}%

### Finding 2: {{secondary_finding_title}}

```sql finding_2_trends
SELECT 
  date_recorded,
  metric_name,
  metric_value,
  category
FROM time_series_data
WHERE metric_name = '{{secondary_metric}}'
  AND date_recorded >= '{{analysis_start_date}}'
ORDER BY date_recorded
```

**Trend Analysis:**
<Chart data={finding_2_trends} x="date_recorded" y="metric_value" type="line" />

**Interpretation:** {{finding_2_interpretation}}

### Finding 3: {{correlation_finding_title}}

```sql correlations
SELECT 
  variable_1,
  variable_2,
  correlation_coefficient,
  correlation_direction,
  correlation_strength
FROM correlation_matrix
WHERE ABS(correlation_coefficient) >= 0.5
ORDER BY ABS(correlation_coefficient) DESC
```

**Correlation Matrix:**
<DataTable data={correlations} />

**Key Relationships:** {{correlation_insights}}

## Statistical Analysis

### Hypothesis Testing Results

```sql hypothesis_results
SELECT 
  test_name,
  p_value,
  test_statistic,
  result,
  interpretation,
  confidence_level
FROM hypothesis_test_results
WHERE p_value < 0.05
ORDER BY p_value ASC
```

<DataTable data={hypothesis_results} />

{{statistical_interpretation}}

### Performance Metrics

```sql performance_data
SELECT 
  category,
  operation,
  value,
  unit,
  benchmark,
  performance_rating
FROM performance_benchmarks
WHERE performance_rating IN ('excellent', 'good')
ORDER BY category, value DESC
```

**System Performance:**
<Chart data={performance_data} x="operation" y="value" type="bar" />

### Data Quality Assessment

```sql quality_metrics
SELECT 
  dimension,
  dataset,
  score,
  quality_level,
  notes
FROM data_quality_metrics
ORDER BY dimension, score DESC
```

**Quality Scorecard:**
<DataTable data={quality_metrics} />

## Interactive Visualizations

### Key Performance Indicators

```sql kpi_summary
SELECT 
  metric_name,
  metric_value,
  unit,
  category,
  CASE 
    WHEN category = 'performance' AND metric_value > 90 THEN 'success'
    WHEN category = 'quality' AND metric_value > 95 THEN 'success'
    WHEN category = 'business' AND metric_value > 100 THEN 'success'
    ELSE 'warning'
  END as status
FROM key_metrics
WHERE date_recorded = '{{current_date}}'
ORDER BY category, metric_name
```

<DataTable data={kpi_summary} />

### Trend Analysis Dashboard

```sql time_series_dashboard
SELECT 
  date_recorded,
  metric_name,
  metric_value,
  category
FROM time_series_data
WHERE date_recorded >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL 30 DAYS
ORDER BY metric_name, date_recorded
```

<Chart data={time_series_dashboard} x="date_recorded" y="metric_value" series="metric_name" type="line" />

### Correlation Heatmap

```sql correlation_heatmap
SELECT 
  variable_1 as x_variable,
  variable_2 as y_variable,
  correlation_coefficient as correlation
FROM correlation_matrix
WHERE ABS(correlation_coefficient) >= 0.3
```

<Chart data={correlation_heatmap} x="x_variable" y="y_variable" value="correlation" type="heatmap" />
